Interface

Class ClosedRails

  • java.lang.Object
    • Interface.ClosedRails

  • public class ClosedRails
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a singleton so the data can be used across modules. Used as the interface between the CTC and Track Controller for which blocks are broken and closed.
    Version:
    12/8/16
    Author:
    Vinayak Nesarikar

        public void updateBlocks(AllTrackBlock Blocks,
                         java.lang.String Line)
        Updates the Block object stored in the class. Then add sets certain broken blocks to closed
        Parameters:
        Blocks - Stores all of the system's block information
        Line - Tells which line the closed block is in
